statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = 10, category = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_management SET item_name = 'Mouse', last_replenished = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = quantity + 5, last_replenished = '2022-05-10' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE inventory_management SET category = 'Electronics', quantity = quantity - 3 WHERE item_name = 'Laptop'
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE chemicals SET hazard_level = 'High', quantity = 50 WHERE chemical_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity + 10, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE seed_name = 'Sunflower';
UPDATE chemicals SET hazard_level = 'High', quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE chemical_name = 'Acetic Acid';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE fertilizers SET quantity = 50, last_replenished = '2022-10-15' WHERE fertilizer_id = 2;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 50, expiration_date = '2023-10-01' WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE pesticides SET quantity = 100, supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' WHERE pesticide_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 50 WHERE seed_name = 'Sunflower Seeds';
UPDATE pesticides SET expiry_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE quantity > 100;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity - 5, expiry_date = '2023-08-31' WHERE seed_id = '43a75416-3a72-4d6d-a3f0-e3e536ab210f';
UPDATE pesticides SET quantity = 100, expiry_date = '2024-02-15' WHERE pesticide_id = '8b709c21-8454-4c28-9270-7ab544e7fadb';

UPDATE fertilizers SET fertilizer_price = 25.50, fertilizer_quantity = 500 WHERE fertilizer_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET seed_quantity = seed_quantity + 100, seed_price = 5.0 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE fertilizers SET fertilizer_quantity = 50, fertilizer_price = 10.5 WHERE fertilizer_id = 3;
